title: CLAUDE.md
text: file provides guidance Claude Code (claude.ai/code) working code repository.

title: CLAUDE.md
text: R package (virustotal) provides R client VirusTotal Public API v2.0 v3.0. VirusTotal Google service analyzes files URLs malware, provides domain categorization, offers passive DNS information.

title: CLAUDE.md
code: # Run all tests R -e "devtools::test()"  # Run tests using testthat directly R -e "testthat::test_dir('tests/testthat')"  # Run package checks (includes tests) R CMD check .

title: CLAUDE.md
code: # Run lintr (mentioned in DESCRIPTION suggests) R -e "lintr::lint_package()"

title: CLAUDE.md
code: # Build package R CMD build .  # Install from source R CMD INSTALL .  # Development installation with devtools R -e "devtools::install(build_vignettes = TRUE)"  # Build documentation R -e "devtools::document()"  # Build pkgdown site R -e "pkgdown::build_site()"

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Authentication: R/set_key.R - Manages API key storage environment variable VirustotalToken HTTP Layer: R/virustotal.R - Contains base GET/POST functions: virustotal_GET(), virustotal_POST() v3 API virustotal2_GET(), virustotal2_POST() v2 API rate_limit() enforces 4 requests/minute limit virustotal_check() handles response validation API Endpoints: Individual R files API endpoint: File operations: scan_file.R, file_report.R, rescan_file.R URL operations: scan_url.R, url_report.R IP operations: ip_report.R, get_ip_info.R, get_ip_votes.R, etc. Domain operations: domain_report.R, get_domain_info.R, etc. Comments/votes: post_comments.R, add_comments.R, etc.

title: CLAUDE.md
text: package implements automatic rate limiting via environment variable VT_RATE_LIMIT tracks request count timing enforce VirusTotal’s 4 requests/minute limit.

title: CLAUDE.md
text: functions use v2 API (virustotal2_* functions) newer functions use v3 API (virustotal_* functions) v3 API uses x-apikey header, v2 uses query parameter

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Tests require VirusTotal API key stored tests/testthat/virustotal_api_key.enc. Tests skipped CRAN run API key available.

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Standard R package structure roxygen2 documentation. Uses pkgdown website generation. Exports 20+ functions interacting VirusTotal API endpoints.

title: Using virustotal
text: virustotal package provides access VirusTotal API v3, allowing scan files URLs malware, get domain IP intelligence, retrieve comprehensive threat analysis reports.

title: Using virustotal
code: # Install from CRAN install.packages("virustotal")  # Or install development version # library(devtools) # install_github("themains/virustotal")

title: Using virustotal
code: library(virustotal)

title: Using virustotal
text: Get free API key VirusTotal Set API key R session:
code: set_key("your_api_key_here")

title: Using virustotal
text: Scan file malware: Get file analysis report: Request file rescan:
code: # Submit a file for analysis result <- scan_file("path/to/suspicious_file.exe") analysis_id <- result$data$id # Get analysis results using file hash report <- file_report("99017f6eebbac24f351415dd410d522d")  # Access scan results scan_results <- report$data$attributes$last_analysis_results total_engines <- length(scan_results) detections <- sum(sapply(scan_results, function(x) x$category == "malicious")) # Request new analysis of existing file rescan_result <- rescan_file("99017f6eebbac24f351415dd410d522d") new_analysis_id <- rescan_result$data$id

title: Using virustotal
text: Scan URL: Get URL analysis report:
code: # Submit URL for analysis url_result <- scan_url("http://suspicious-site.com") analysis_id <- url_result$data$id # Get analysis results using URL report <- url_report("http://www.google.com")  # Access scan results scan_results <- report$data$attributes$last_analysis_results threat_score <- report$data$attributes$stats

title: Using virustotal
code: # Get comprehensive domain analysis domain_info <- domain_report("google.com")  # Access various data points categories <- domain_info$data$attributes$categories whois_data <- domain_info$data$attributes$whois dns_records <- domain_info$data$attributes$dns_records

title: Using virustotal
code: # Get IP analysis including geolocation and ASN ip_info <- ip_report("8.8.8.8")  # Access geo and network information country <- ip_info$data$attributes$country asn <- ip_info$data$attributes$asn network <- ip_info$data$attributes$network

title: Using virustotal
text: package automatically handles VirusTotal’s rate limits (4 requests per minute free accounts). don’t need implement rate limiting.

title: Using virustotal
text: functions include comprehensive input validation provide clear error messages common issues like missing API keys invalid parameters.

title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Gaurav Sood (). virustotal: R Client VirusTotal API. R package version 0.5.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {virustotal: R Client for the VirusTotal API},   author = {Gaurav Sood},   note = {R package version 0.5.0}, }

what: virustotal: R Client for the VirusTotal Public API v2.0 and v3.0
title: R Client for the VirusTotal API
text: Use VirusTotal, Google service analyzes files URLs viruses, worms, trojans etc., provides category content hosted domain variety prominent services, provides passive DNS information, among things. package supports VirusTotal API v2.0 (legacy) v3.0 (current). v3.0 API provides richer data including IoC relationships, sandbox dynamic analysis, static file information, YARA rules, comprehensive threat intelligence. API Rate Limits: - Public API: 500 requests/day, 4 requests/minute - Premium API: daily rate limitations Supported Operations: - Files: Upload, scan, get reports, download, comments, votes, relationships - URLs: Submit analysis, get reports, comments, votes, relationships - Domains: Get reports, comments, votes, relationships, WHOIS data - IP Addresses: Get reports, comments, votes, relationships, passive DNS See https://www.virustotal.com information.

previous_headings: virustotal: R Client for the VirusTotal Public API v2.0 and v3.0
title: R Client for the VirusTotal API
text: get current released version CRAN: get current development version GitHub:
code: install.packages("virustotal") install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("themains/virustotal", build_vignettes = TRUE)

code: # Using virustotal vignette("using_virustotal", package = "virustotal")

virustotal 0.5.0
text: Modernized Package Architecture: Complete modernization virustotal package enhanced security, error handling, user experience.

title: virustotal 0.5.0
text: Structured Error Handling: New S3 error classes (virustotal_error, virustotal_auth_error, virustotal_validation_error, virustotal_rate_limit_error) provide detailed error information better debugging. S3 Response Classes: API responses now return structured S3 objects (virustotal_file_report, virustotal_domain_report, etc.) custom print() summary() methods better user experience. Modern Rate Limiting: Replaced environment variable-based rate limiting sliding window implementation properly manages 4 requests/minute VirusTotal API limit. Comprehensive Input Validation: Added robust input validation using checkmate package security-focused sanitization functions. Enhanced Security Utilities: New security functions safe file operations input sanitization prevent common security issues.

title: virustotal 0.5.0
text: Updated CI/CD: Migrated Travis CI/AppVeyor GitHub Actions comprehensive testing matrix (R oldrel-1, release, devel). Modern Dependencies: Updated minimum R version 4.0.0, migrated plyr dplyr, added modern packages (checkmate, jsonlite, rlang). Enhanced Documentation: Improved documentation roxygen2 markdown support comprehensive examples. Test Coverage: Expanded test suite proper mocking support comprehensive error handling validation.

title: virustotal 0.5.0
text: Improved Domain Processing: Enhanced domain cleaning logic properly handles URLs protocols, www prefixes, paths. Better Error Messages: informative error messages parameter context suggested fixes. Response Formatting: Rich response formatting detection summaries, file metadata, threat intelligence display.

title: virustotal 0.5.0
text: Minimum R version increased 3.3.0 4.0.0 internal functions refactored (user-facing) Error objects now use structured S3 classes instead simple character strings

title: virustotal 0.5.0
text: Fixed rate limiting edge cases timing issues Improved handling malformed API responses Enhanced validation precedence better test compatibility Fixed Unicode character encoding utility functions

title: virustotal 0.5.0
text: Added virustotal_info() function package configuration diagnostics Enhanced rate limit status reporting get_rate_limit_status() Improved temporary file management security-focused utilities

title: virustotal 0.3.0
virustotal 0.3.0
text: BREAKING: Migrated core functions VirusTotal API v3 BREAKING: Function return types changed data.frame list (following v3 API structure) Updated functions: file_report(), scan_file(), rescan_file(), url_report(), scan_url(), domain_report(), ip_report() Removed deprecated virustotal2_* function calls user-facing functions

title: virustotal 0.3.0
text: Enhanced input validation functions Automatic URL encoding v3 API compatibility Improved error messages actionable guidance Support IPv6 addresses ip_report() Domain name normalization (removes protocols, www, paths)

title: virustotal 0.3.0
text: Comprehensive test suite 47+ tests Added input validation tests core functions Proper error handling tests GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline replacing AppVeyor Multi-platform testing (Ubuntu, Windows, macOS) Automated test coverage reporting

title: virustotal 0.3.0
text: Updated function documentation v3 API Comprehensive vignette rewrite modern examples Updated references point current VirusTotal documentation Added usage examples major functions

title: virustotal 0.3.0
text: Added base64enc URL encoding support Updated imports suggests modern R ecosystem

title: virustotal 0.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-04 support domain ip v3 deprecate v2 domain ip functions

title: virustotal 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2017-05-01 extensive linting, passes expect_no_lint url_report now returns service name

title: virustotal 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2016-11-12 Removed link bitdefender CRAN issues Better documentation examples including comment set_key, better formatting Better error handling consistent returned data structures url_report, file_report, rescan_file url_report now accepts scan_id param Warning messages end new line Added tests, specifically checking returns happens params/hash incorrect Enforces rate limiting — 4 queries per minute. Graceful error handling error limit exceeded. changed virustotal VirusTotal CRAN doesn’t muck around.

title: virustotal 0.1.0
